    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94196</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Changing direction of a moving object</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändernde Richtung einer beweglichen Nachricht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Direction changeante d'un objet mobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentido em mudança de um objeto movente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Senso cambiante di un oggetto commovente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταβαλλόμενη κατεύθυνση ενός κινούμενου αντικειμένου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dirección que cambia de un objeto móvil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the force applied on a football (blue arrow) that made it change it's direction towards the goal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">football</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">goal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Kraft, die auf einem 
Fußball aufgewendet wird (blauer Pfeil) der es Änderung vornahm, 
die, es Richtung in Richtung zum Ziel ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la force appliquée sur
un football (flèche bleue) qui lui a fait le changement que c'est 
direction vers le but.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a força aplicada em um 
football (seta azul) que lhe faça a mudança que é sentido para o 
objetivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la forza applicata su
un gioco del calcio (freccia blu) che gli ha reso il cambiamento che 
è senso verso l'obiettivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει η δύναμη που εφαρμόζεται 
σε ένα ποδόσφαιρο (μπλε βέλος) που το έκανε την αλλαγή είναι 
κατεύθυνση προς το στόχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la fuerza aplicada en un 
balompié (flecha azul) que le realizó el cambio que es dirección 
hacia la meta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fußball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
